content: this square is worked in row and then a border is worked around it it is classified as easy stitches used are single_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet lsc and the elmore stitch which is fully explained use your imagination to render your own beautiful stained glass square what a wonderful addition to your charity or swap afghan - but don t forget to make one for yourself come join me at my ravelry group 1 where we test patterns and host cals and swaps 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/melinda-miller-designs
